information.version: Display the version of the application and API. information version
information.help: Show help information and all commands.

discord.shiftadd: Note that someone attended a shift. discord shiftadd [host] [user]
discord.report: Report an user with optionally an image for proof. discord shiftadd [reporter] [reported] (image link)

roster.getversion: Get the RosterAPI current deployment version
